website_summaries.verdict: A smaller, affordable paper shredder that is designed for occasional, light duty, home use.
pros: This compact, desktop shredder has built-in overload and overheat protection and only weighs a little over 6 pounds
The convenient auto start helps streamline the shredding process while the manual reverse can help you out if you run into a jam
cons: Remember, this is a lighter duty shredder
It is not designed for high volume shredding or highly sensitive documents

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the job
customer_reviews.text: I received the product a day earlier than expected and immediately took it out of the box and began shredding. Since I was taking my time, having to open mail and destroying old documents, I was able to shred for longer periods than the 4 minutes because it didn't have time to get hot. Also, I wasn't doing 6 sheets, but more so randomly. To alleviate mail back-up, I've sat it under a chair table where I put my mail by the front door. Now, I open mail, shred what I don't need and walk away. I just wish it came in colors...a nice blue would blend in so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, cheap paper shredder
customer_reviews.text: I got this paper shredder through Amazon. I usually got my prior shredders at Staples, but they all were expensive, except for when there was a sale on a particular model. Since there was no sale at Staples, I went with the Bonsaii 6-sheet shredder for my home use, and it's working just fine for what I need it for. I like that it's smaller than my last shredder, so I'm glad that I made the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: George Hayao

customer_reviews.title: Seems well built
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is about the same speed and noise level as my previous one, but it's better built. My former shredder finally quit because the cutter blades in the center, where envelopes go through, became bent. I probably fed it some envelopes that had more than 6 pages. The cutting wheels on this model are way beefier than my previous one. I think the motor would stall long before these cutting wheels could be damaged. I also like the big window that shows how much paper is in the bin.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Barackman

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This works like a charm. I have shredded credit cards, staples, multiple pages...and works perfectly. It is not too noisy...but they're all a little noisy. This one is quieter than the other I owned. Like that it has a handle to lift top off to empty. Overall...I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this shredder and it works great. I’ve shredded a bunch of documents and old credit cards. No problem! Not that loud either.
customer_reviews.author: HorsesBooksGuitars00

customer_reviews.title: Very useful paper shredder
customer_reviews.text: We tested this Bonsaii 6 Sheet Cross Cut Paper Shredder and it worked as intended. I don't have a lot of paper to cut so I never put more that 2 sheets of paper. That's enough for me. But it really works without much noise and is fast. I recommend this product since the price is also affordable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Value, capability, and features.
customer_reviews.text: Imo, this was the best value for the money based upon customer reviews. Pros: light weight, sturdy, nice grab handle, informative display with light indicators, see through bin, and safety features. Cons: slow, the bin is cheap, and minimal paper feed, but considering the price it is very consistent in speed. If you feed it under the 6 page count, it will run longer. Lastly, I could not turn down the 4 year warranty package.
customer_reviews.author: Pluto2727

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Shreds up to four pages at a time. No problems with the machine. Container is a bit small and requires frequent emptying if shredding a lot of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Birdy Bob

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in March 2020, used for normal household mail maybe once a week, followed all shredding guidelines. Had a problem with in the first month. Called the manufacturer and recieved very little help. Service agent said to just add shredder oil to the device which I purchased right away and added the oil. Still had issues with the device and now the device doesnt work at all and of course the window to return the item expired on May 31 2020 and today is June 18 2020. Less the par device with terrible customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer quinn

customer_reviews.title: Toy machine What a joke, Wrong Description
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this product you will waste you time . this is a toy machine. not for home or home office as it say on the Amazon page. Wrong description.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this twice in my house, i didn’t evenput 6 sheets all together coz I’m trying to not overload it but on the second use, this annoying sound started. I’m returning this crap!
customer_reviews.author: Gem Of Miami

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this less than a month ago. My old Amazon shredder stopped working and I needed a new one. I took on the project of cleaning out my apartment before May 1st- which included mail that traveled with me from 3 different apartments. The shredder came early and it never stopped working! I ended up shredding 5 big garbage bags full and it didn’t jam, stop or overheat. It is a little loud, so make sure you don’t have babies or pets sensitive to loud sounds around it There wasn’t a lot of reviews on this shredder so I was hesitant at first. I’m SO GLAD I purchased this shredder and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this shredder for a few months. It started out working fine and is no noisier than other shredders. I've been very careful to only do small bunches of materials so it doesn't overheat. I can now only get 1 paper through at a time and sometimes even that jams. It started out crosscutting, but now it's cutting in long strips and keeps clogging up the works. I've had it with this shredder.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that the driver was very nice. I tested it out and it works fine so far. Glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shredder purchase

customer_reviews.title: Gets Job Done But Top Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Compact, smaller sized shredder gets the job done. However, even with following instructions it seems to approach being over heated. Also the lid does not lock in place and is top heavy. This is an issue if you accidentally bump the shredder, it can fall over. The handle is nice but not as functional as I needed. I thought the handle would be for convenient lifting or moving of the shredder. Sadly not the case. Handle is only meant to lift of the lid off the bin in order to empty out the bin. Deducted 2 stars for these reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Eggy

customer_reviews.title: Going in the trash can. Terrible. Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Wow. Terrible product. Less than 5 sheets of paper and 2 hours later out of the box brand new and IT JAMS. No way I can each to reverse the 1 paper that went in sideways. None of the buttons helped solve the issue. Cant return. Going in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: Crosshreds, Small Footprint, Shreds Credit Cards Easily
customer_reviews.text: I like that this shredder has a small footprint, shreds credit cards, and cross shreds. Initially, we shred about two large sized garbage bags of documents with no problem but had to empty the container frequently due to it's small size. Now that we're caught up, we just shred a few documents a week. Have to lift the shredder top off frequently to push the paper down while shredding or it gets stuck at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal K.

customer_reviews.title: It is quiet, 6 seconds per page.
customer_reviews.text: I liked That it was so quiet and shreds a page in 6 seconds. Stays running so that another page immediately . Page should be inserted straight into the opening. When the window shows it is full, use use the handy handle , lift off the shredder and push the paper down otherwise the shredded paper will be picked up and may jam the shreader. I ad some 3 in 1 oil after a ream of paper. ...or..... take the oil to 2 pages of paper. Oil should be added to the edges Of the oiled pager. Last shredder lasted 6 years. This one does a better job and has a HANDLE!. most do not.
customer_reviews.author: BRD

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the size fool you!
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is great for a small home office. It can handle up to 5 pages at a time and is budget-friendly. It shreds documents slower than some of the more oversized products, but that is to be expected due to the price range and size. Even though it is small, this product does not overheat quickly and can shred documents for 10 minutes without stopping. I recommend giving this product a try!
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: COVID Office Update 101!
customer_reviews.text: Well, COVID hit and I used to rent an office downtown that included all the shredding I could use, but I needed shredding in my home office. I bought this little beauty and well I love it. It's not too big and not too small. It works perfect for a small home office that shreds maybe 6 papers a day and the junk mail. This is ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Breaks immediately
customer_reviews.text: Broke after the very first time we used it. This thing is garbage DO NOT BUT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Spurlock

customer_reviews.title: Great for Worm Bedding
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a day! I use this product to shred old documents and use those as bedding for my composting worm bins. I used to have to do it by hand with scissors, but this machine shreds paper into the perfect size in seconds and enables me to turn trash into nutrient rich compost. Great investment!
customer_reviews.author: EJK

customer_reviews.title: Small and gets the job done!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s small yet gets the job done. Definitely not for office use, I was skeptical on buying it since the reviews didn’t convince me, seen a lot of people having issues with over heating. I ran it for about 1hr without stopping and the overheating button never turned on so that’s a plus. Definitely can’t pass more then 5 sheets because it sounds kinda forced but other then that it gets the job done never jammed on me for the 1hr I as using it and it did it’s job so if your looking for home use and aren’t shredding a lot of stuff I’d definitely recommend this paper shredder.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Celis

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of the shredder. It however, shuts off automatically very often. After about 5 minutes of shredding the unit over heats and shuts down and you have to wait about 3 hours for it to cool and start over. It does not handle large jobs. It is fine for a few pages but does not perform well after about 5 cycles of 5 page shredding. Perhaps a refund is in order.
customer_reviews.author: earl schlunk

customer_reviews.title: It does not make confettie
customer_reviews.text: It will have to do, but not what i expected.
customer_reviews.author: Janet M. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Very loud and very slow.
customer_reviews.text: When you open the box, the first thing you'll notice is the intense smell of machine oil. I took this as a good sign, because shredders require it, then I saw an unremovable fire warning sticker on the top of the shredder. The white sticker contrasts the black shredder pretty badly. The handle looks great in the pictures, but once you grab it, you realize it's a front-side piece of hollow plastic (the back is empty). The two worst things are how loud and how slow it is. For six more dollars, but the Amazon Basics one. I'm going to make a second attempt at returning it after this review.
customer_reviews.author: Profile Name

customer_reviews.title: I’d spend a little more on a valuable shredder if I were you
customer_reviews.text: I’m not one to give bad or mediocre reviews but with this shredder, you basically get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson M Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Good, but too loud!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had the shredder for about 3 months now. It works better than the Embassy shredder that I have. The pieces are a little bit bigger than I would like, but it beats the strip cut. I am able to prevent the shredder from cutting off on me before overheating by taking documents that I need to shred out of the envelopes first. This is a nice shredder, but my goodness, it is a LOUD little devil. If it wasn't for that, I would give the shredder five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy McG

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for replacing the product, but.....
customer_reviews.text: I received a shredder and it didn't work properly and Amazon replaced it promptly with a new one. The new one honestly isn't much better. The first shredder wouldn't even shred one piece of paper. The second one is a little bit better, but I cant imagine that it could shred a credit card like its supposed to. I feel as if I have to baby it to get any use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Kofron

customer_reviews.title: Worst paper shredder that I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this paper shredder but it was not working very well so Amazon replace it with the same model but the replacement was not much better than the first. It is listed as being able to take 6 sheets of paper but it seems to bog down with 2 sheets. half of the time it doesn't even feed the whole sheet and I have to re-feed the sheet. I would not recomend buying this paper shredder.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Rhoten

customer_reviews.title: Pretty dependable budget shredder
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent budget shredder good for small jobs. Now to be honest I should be using a more high capacity shredder but my budget wasn't going to allow that so I got this fellow, and he's doing great! We've been shredding with this shredder like CIA Spec Op closing shop and high tailing back to the U.S. Of A and so far no jams or overheating. So if you have a small office or a backlog of papers that need to be shredded you can't go wrong with this fella
customer_reviews.author: Arkady

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shredder hoping it would last more than a few weeks like my last one. So far, so good, 1 month gone. It will chop up 6 sheets of paper at one time without jamming. The scrap bin holds much more than expected & with the view window, you can monitor how much is in there. I'm glad I found it. I leave it on "Auto" & it will automatically start when paper is inserted. That's a good deal
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Carlton

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Definitely more for "home" than office. Small (it's on the right and Amazon Basic is on the left) and unexpectedly noisy for its size. Doesn't seem to have much power - it was very slow shredding one 8.5x11 sheet that was folded in half. Will keep since I need it right now but wouldn't recommend nor buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bonsai shredder
customer_reviews.text: This bonsai shredder works very well. It's a great price for an important tool that's much needed for shredding credit cards, junk mail, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: So far it's working great... I am not abusing it! It is fairly small and needs to be emptied often but the handle on the top is GREAT! If you're like me with arthritis the ones without a handle are awkward and heavy. It is also fairly quiet when it's shredding. So I'm very happy with this. Note I don't need to use it all that often. Light usage.
customer_reviews.author: LeslieB

customer_reviews.title: Smells like Burning Plastic...
customer_reviews.text: So I like the shredder in general. I like that it cuts up the paper in both directions and can handle a decent amount of paper (6 sheets). My biggest complaint and the reason why it's 3 stars and not a 4 or 5 star product is because everytime I shred something, whether it's 1 or 6 sheets of paper, the shredder produces a terrible, acrid, burning plastic/motor smell. I'm going to buy some shredder oil and see if it alleviates the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Beaubeaux

customer_reviews.title: Ok, not great
customer_reviews.text: Cuts well, but gets jammed easily, but with the manual reverse switch, it's no big deal. Powerful enough for what it is, I wasn't expecting a powerhouse, but it gets the job done easily enough. Chews staples easily as well as credit cards. It does seem to beat up quickly though, it says 4 minutes continuous runtime, I could use it for about 2 minutes before overheating, but it cooled quickly. Shreds nicely and into small enough pieces to feel secure in tossing it out.
customer_reviews.author: Rob T.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about a month and a half ago. Because my Mother passed I didn't use it until yesterday. I didn't over load it. Only put two sheets at a time in it. In other words I was careful with it. Unplugged it to empty. Put it back together went to use it and it won't turn on .My last shredder worked for twenty years. Past my return date so I can't send it back.
customer_reviews.author: mary dougherty

customer_reviews.title: MimiMe so cute be nice to it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok we bought this because it was cheap and didn’t need anything heavy duty . Was surprised how small it is about half the size of previous shredder that died . We affectionately call it “minime”. The instructions say don’t use for more than 4 minutes every 40 minutes so we use it during tv commercials . It does do plastic slowly. Yes I would buy it again .
customer_reviews.author: Couvduck

customer_reviews.title: Great for the home, or college student
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shredder for the home. If you need to shred mail or old credit cards. Small to fit in a small space in a home office. Easy to empty with the built in handle that many home office shredders lack. If you have an excessive amount of daily shredding, this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in a sort of emergency situation as my sister & I cleared out her mother-in-law’s home. It worked for about 20-30 minutes & then stopped. We tried again later but it never worked. I was able to return it to amazon but had to buy a box to ship it in. (It should have been a free return with Amazon Prime.)
customer_reviews.author: PamH

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for several hours
customer_reviews.text: I used the shredder to dispose of personal records, as I am planning to move and have accumulated unnecessary documents no longer needed. I used it for about 2 - 3 hours straight and it did not overheat or cause any problems. I did not insert staples, although I believe you can, just to be on the safe side.
customer_reviews.author: Love Books

customer_reviews.title: The One!
customer_reviews.text: This is a power 🔋 house A small item that surprisingly gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: #Happy with Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this shredder I've had mail stacking up needing to go. Tried and within 5 minutes jammed. Tried getting paper stuck out or reverse. Cooling downnothing. So I returned. I didn't even put as many papers as it said I could ai once either.
customer_reviews.author: lisa lengenfelder

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: My only concern was the button to control the shredder came off so I have to use a pen to control the on & off button. It only overheated once but it shredded so much including old credit cards
customer_reviews.author: Kendria Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Extremely loud. Can only shred maybe 3 pages at time. Overheats after only about 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: pako

customer_reviews.title: Working well so far
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is very similar to my last one of a different brand. Everything is fine so far, although the "ON" sliding switch seems a bit loose, as if it will soon not work at all. Time will tell, but I don't like the design of the switch. All is working now, though.
customer_reviews.author: Complexity

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This works great even on credit cards! I often use the handle to try and lift it to move it out of the way, lol. But the handle is only to lift the shredder so you can empty it.
customer_reviews.author: mzsierra

customer_reviews.title: 6 sheet shredder is right! failed after 7 pages.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this thing. there are cheaper shredders that are far more reliable. we shredded a total of 7 pages before it jammed and overheated.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Good Shredder
customer_reviews.text: I use this shredder for home office use and it works well. Not a whole lot to say other than it shreds it well and I feel fine about throwing the shreds into my garbage. Good price and works well for me. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ParkCity Skier

customer_reviews.title: Good company!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this shredder at the end of July. We literally have used it twice got it out tonight to shred some documents and after 2 sheets the overheat light came. Contacted the company and they are sending us a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice D. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Shredder
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is horrible. It is loud when shredding and shreds very slowly. It is also very easily stuck. It is a bust for the money it costs.
customer_reviews.author: Deacon Harris

customer_reviews.title: Don’t let the size fool you.
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is way smaller than the one being replaced. Thought about returning it for a larger one but am satisfied with its size, being able to fit in a smaller place, the quality of shredding and the ease of usage.
customer_reviews.author: DBSW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Compact Shredder
customer_reviews.text: Wow this shredder is amazing. Shreds fast and very comfortable to use. The compact design helps in storage. I am very satisfied with this purchase. If you need a shredder, I definitely recommend this one especially the great value pricing....
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Mariano

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small shredded to destroy a few documents a month without paying a lot of money. This is perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Decent shredder, some issues
customer_reviews.text: The shredder came out of the plastic with some oily substance on it which I had to clean off, it smelled kind of similar to gasoline. The shredder works well but after continued use starts to smell a bit like burning.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: It sounds but does not shred the paper
customer_reviews.text: After three week of using it did not work any more
customer_reviews.author: MJ Oviedo

customer_reviews.title: Good cross cut shredder
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working fine. It's a little slower than our last shredder but I'm sure it's because it also has a cross cutter. Pieces are much smaller and I feel more secure with this type of shredder. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Defective product.
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving the schreader. I immediately unpacked it and plugged it into a wall socket turned it on and nothing happened. I played with all the switches and no lights lit up, and nothing happened. I proceeded to two other wall outlets with the same results. I was very surprised and dissapointed. Hopefully Amazon might start to carry more name brand paper schreaders.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Bolduc

customer_reviews.title: Impressive performance for its size--ideal for light use.
customer_reviews.text: Wish the trash bin was bigger but small price to pay for such a marvelous shredder! It works beautifully if you follow the directions and takes very little space and is quite easy to handle and lightweight. Very impressed by this shredder!
customer_reviews.author: PTW

customer_reviews.title: Dependable.
customer_reviews.text: This is a small shredder for home and it is perfect for me. It is automatic and turns itself off after shredding your papers. I really like it. It is pretty and modern.
customer_reviews.author: marie tilson

customer_reviews.title: Will Not Prevent Theft
customer_reviews.text: This Shredder shreds to the size indicated but that is not enough to ensure your information isn't retrievable. The pieces are still large enough for your full SS# to be displayed.
customer_reviews.author: Starlet

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Not the fastest, certainly not he quietest, six sheets at once makes it grumble a bit, but it grinds through my paper crap crap just fine. And the price can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M

customer_reviews.title: Small with handle
customer_reviews.text: Much much quieter than the one it replaced. A bit slower but for home use that handle is very useful. I also like the fact it can be turned off when it's emptied.
customer_reviews.author: bmac32

customer_reviews.title: Not intended for long use.
customer_reviews.text: I didnt realize that you could only use it for 4 minutes then you have to let it rest for 40 minutes. Ive only used it once and I didnt overheat but I was very careful not to go over 4 minutes. This would best be used for junk mail I suppose. I wanted to clean out some old school papers.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Hagger

customer_reviews.title: It arrived so quickly!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived the day after I ordered it. It came a day early. Thank you so much! I have used it already and it is a very good shredder. Thanks, again! (Mary Anne)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Use it to shred my mail and other types of documents that I don't need. It works great, hasn't jammed, hasn't overheated, but it can be loud. Shreds up to 6 papers easily, but I just do 2-4 at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Nice little shredder for a tight budget. Worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: I like that it doesn't take up much space, very compact. it has a handle so you can pick it up and empty the bin. I thought it was going to be louder but it's about what you expect?
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after one day.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great the first day. The next day it went straight to the "Overload/Overheat" light even though it had been off for over 12 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Lakesha

customer_reviews.title: Ok shredder.  Does not really take 6 pages
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for 2 days. Shredded a bunch of stuff yesterday for 4 hours and now it feels like it is dying. Can't really handle the 6 pages as advertised. Shredded pieces get stuck a lot...need to clear/clean it every so many pages shredded. See photo for what it looks like after shredding about 16 pages (2 @ a time). Need to clean this out or else it will get more stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad shredder as long as you don’t do more than three sheets at a time
customer_reviews.text: It was the Amazon recommended paper shredder, it says you can do six sheets at a time but anything more than three jams it up
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Reesman

customer_reviews.title: Screads quickly
customer_reviews.text: This one is so much better than the one I had. The first just shredded in strips. This one shreds i in 4 different directions.
customer_reviews.author: howard blair

customer_reviews.title: works well for the cost
customer_reviews.text: machine does not take the paper to be shredded easily. you have to hit a specific spot for the paper to enter the machine. it can be irritating , but it does work.
customer_reviews.author: kono

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job!  But not for long...
customer_reviews.text: for home office...does a good job. I have to amend this review. I shredded 2 credit cards. Now the machine won't work at all. I cleaned it out, etc. Nothing happening! Disgusted.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Turney

customer_reviews.title: Occasional use
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly easy clean up. Didn't have alot of paper confetti jammed between the blades like my old one. However, the run time for this shredder is only good for the occasional junk mailings and not a massive purge of old accumulated docs. Had it for a couple of months and I had been slowly feeding it my old docs. Blades and motor are still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Mighty mouse
customer_reviews.text: I love this little baby, I just have to control the urge to try to put too many sheets in at once. But it is working 👍 great. It is very small, but mighty
customer_reviews.author: Ransdal

customer_reviews.title: Poor design gets poor Reliability
customer_reviews.text: I've gone thru home shredders over the last forty years with all lasting a minimum of five to seven years operating as advertised. I open the box on this shredder and run less than 20 sheets, 1 to 2 at a time and the machine malfunctioned. Specifically, paper gangs up in the corners and allows the shredder to run continuously. There are more reliable machines on the market at this price, don't get duped!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: It does the job.  Great for home-office
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Small enough to fit in small/hidden space but powerful enough to shred. A bit noisy but it's a shredder after all, and does the job well done.
customer_reviews.author: Ding-Dong

customer_reviews.title: Don’t
customer_reviews.text: How does a machine work for 4 minutes then need a 40 minute nap? Ridiculous How can you get anything done? Just sad. Kept jamming with just one sheet. Save your money
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Baskin

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as reviews suggest
customer_reviews.text: Slower than expected. Can only use for four minutes and then have to let it rest for way longer. Manufacturer also suggest oiling the blades. But did not include oil or suggest what kind. On and off switch is iffy. Once I thought it wasn't going to come back on. I now just leave it in the on position and unplug it.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Like the product love the way it shipped. USPS. Same time everyday with my mailman. Anybody else never know what time you be getting it.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Calarese

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: They did not include the plastic shield that covers the hole where you can see how full the bucket is. Tried to call customer service but there was no answer.
customer_reviews.author: writer16

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize what a limitation it had on the number of pages you can put through the shredder before over heating

customer_reviews.title: As advertised, simple instructions
customer_reviews.text: Timely delivery. Package in excellent condition. User friendly manual and shreds paper.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: It works well it’s just too small fills up too fast and you have to constantly empty it

customer_reviews.title: Works for what I need
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my home and works ok. I fold my paper in half because full sheets wants to shred crooked.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Nothing is more satisfying than throwing out bags of shredded paperwork!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Liberati

customer_reviews.title: x
customer_reviews.text: I am just not happy with this item. Takes to long to shred just a few pieces and the have to wait in between.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Y Walker

customer_reviews.title: PASS
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working, used it once. Second time wouldn’t shred anything! Don’t waste money!
customer_reviews.author: CAM

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Tried 4 sheets at a time. One end jammed almost immediately. Only used less than 4 mins per hour as per guidance. Second day tried 2 sheets. Third day it would no longer shred at all despite trouble shooting. Currently sitting in our garbage pile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Even though this is a little more secure a shredder than I really needed I have no complaints. Works well and is qiuet and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: John Petruff

customer_reviews.title: Shredder
customer_reviews.text: Great price works perfectly but you can’t collect very much before it must be emptied
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B. Uphoff

customer_reviews.title: They stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.text: My shredder was working great. I had a problem. The company took care of it very quickly. They sent me a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.text: Great little shredder! Shreds well and also shreds credit cards. Very compact
customer_reviews.author: Monica Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Something You MUST shred
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Performs as expected. I use religiously and so far no problems.

customer_reviews.text: This works just fine for the intended purpose - shredding paper

customer_reviews.text: Great product. I just wish I had bought a larger capacity model.

customer_reviews.text: Its ok I thought it was a little bigger than that but it does everything I expected it do. For the money, its a great price.

product_meta.title: Shredder for Home, Bonsaii 6 Sheet Cross Cut Paper Shredder for Small Home Office Use, Portable Handle Design with 3.4 Gallons Wastebasket (C237-B)
product_meta.description:
Great for Your Home Office
Bonsaii Small home office Paper Shedder make it easy to use and perfect for your home office. It can shred all of your sensitive personal information from old tax records, bills to bank statements. Paper shredder can shred up to 6 sheets of paper at a time into 13/64 x 1-37/64 inches (5x40mm) smaller particles than standard cross-cut, minimizes your important document of identity theft..

No Hassle and Easy Operation
The bonsai shredder features convenient small handles for easily lifting the shredding part to empty the wastebasket when it is full watching through the window in the front.
In the auto start mode, the shredding begins automatically when the sensor in the middle of the feed slot detects paper inserting. If the shredder is jammed due to shredding exceed paper, the manual reverse can help clear it out.

Overheating Protection
Bonsaii shredder is equipped with an overheating protection system. If it shreds continuously beyond the max running time and begins to overheat, the unit will automatically shut off to protect the motor. 
Using tips: 
1. Shredder an 'oil sandwich' once a month for prolonging the lifetime of the home office paper shredder. 
2. When not in use, unplug and leave in the corner by outlet ready to go next time. 
. 
1-Year Warranty: The warranty of this unit is 12 months from the date of first purchase, provided that the machine has been used appropriately, which ensures the least worries and best experience that we could provide for our dearest customers.

NOTE: A few pieces of shredded paper may be found inside the shredder blades or the wastebasket due to the 100% full shredding test in the process of manufacturing to ensure quality. If you are not satisfied, please contact customer service for further assistance.
feature_bullets: Cross-cut Shredder: Home office shredder with 6-sheet capacity without removing staples, shreds paper into tiny pieces measuring 13/64 x 1-37/64 inches (5x40mm) in a short time.
Overload And Overheat Protection：The Bonsaii Paper shredder will run continuously for 4 minutes before needing a 40-minute cool-down.

High-Security P-3 Level: Shredder for home office which can destroy clips, staples, and credit card (one at a time), receipts, bills and important document. Maximize the security of your personal information.
Convenient Design: Portable handle with 3.4 gallons transparent window bin makes it easy to see when it is full.Auto Start And Manual Reverse makes easy work of clearing any paper jams easily.

Moderate size (14.1 x 11.8 x 7 inches) make it practical as using in small home office or business office. Bonsaii paper shredder comes with a 1 year limited warranty and provides 7x24 hour online service.
